content: The FMM say that having no warnings is required for FMM 1. There is no mention of errors. Is this intended? :grinning:
the build won't work if there's errors

That's for core. IGs will build. The rule with errors is - unless it's a publisher issue (and thus either not actually an error with your content), you aren't allowed to publish - at least within HL7.

Thanks.
So localisations of FMM need to consider adding "no errors" localised FMM1.
